source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.
source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts

items.title: Painting a Sand Dollar Beach Scene with Watercolor
items.headline: Relaxing watercolor course on creating layers and depth.
objectives_summary: Students will learn to create a lovely beach scene with a sand dollar using watercolors.

items.title: Daily Drawing Challenge: 14 things to draw
items.headline: Form a habit of drawing daily with this 14 days of daily drawing challenge!
objectives_summary: Learn to draw various things every day!
Draw with me and have a set of drawings at the end of this challenge!
Learn to arrange drawings and create a scene with them!

items.title: Handmade Soap Making & Butter Making Recipes for Beginners
items.headline: This course is a complete guideline on make Handmade Soap and body butter making
objectives_summary: How to make handmade Soap? Soap Making step by step
Learn to make body butter at home step by step
How to use body butter

items.title: How to Draw Hyper Realistic Lips
items.headline: Using pencil, charcoal and chalk to draw the human lips
objectives_summary: How to draw hyper realistic lips and teeth
Understanding how to apply the materials and tools
Understanding proportions and shapes

items.title: Make Soap With the Cold Process and also Hot Process Soap
items.headline: Soap with the cold process, and hot process , This course is a complete guideline
objectives_summary: How to make the soap with the cold process complete guideline
How to make Hot Process Soap in a crock pot step by step
How to make Activated Charcoal face soap

visible_instructors.title: Moses Sabayi

items.headline: This course with 15 lessons  may be just what you are looking for to help your child grow as an Artist. Ages 7+
objectives_summary: How to draw Domestic Animals
How to color and shade Animals

items.title: Oil painting tutorial desert landscape, musicians and dancer
items.headline: How to paint Rajasthan Sahara desert landscape, sky and clouds, figurative group of people male & female, tribal dancer
objectives_summary: How to paint desert
Brushes and paints used for painting
How to paint sky and clouds

items.title: Painting Acrylics for Beginners and Beyond - Wren & Poppies.
items.headline: A complete step by step guide to creating your own decorative painting in Acrylics, with informative additional videos.
objectives_summary: How to follow a step by step guide to creating your own decorative painting in acrylics.
Learn about the basics of colour and how to mix your own.
Explore the different surfaces you can paint on with Acrylics.

items.title: Basic of Lockpicking: How to Make Your Own Lockpicking Set
items.headline: A detailed guide on how to make a custom-made lockpicking set
objectives_summary: Promise: You will learn how to make your own lock picking tools
We use simple and readily available tools and materials for this project
By the end, we will use our hand-made tools and pick a lock

items.title: Ambition Omnibus
items.headline: Learn a CLASSIC of magic & ALL the sleight of hand techniqes you will require.
objectives_summary: How to ENTERTAIN with MAGIC and not 'just do tricks'.
Sleight Of Hand from Basic to Advanced techniques.
How to PRESENT your magic

items.title: 3D paper tole with curtain effect painting

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist and Founder of Art Attic
visible_instructors.name: Shwetha
visible_instructors.title: Shwetha SG

items.headline: learn how to create 3d effect to your artwork and also learn how to paint a curtain.
objectives_summary: 3D Paper tole with Curtain Effect Painting

You will learn how to create this stunning decor piece with a very unique technique. Its a perfect blend of art and craft techniques!! It's a mix of handpainting and papercrafting called 3D Paper tole. No prior painting experience is needed. Doesn't it look interesting and refreshing?? Would u love to try this artform, without investing much in any materials? Then this workshop is designed just for you. You will be learning * Several tricks on How to paint a window and get a perfect curtain effect with a detailed step by step instruction. * Along with it get introduced to a new art form of papercrafting and create 3d effects using the paper tole technique. All these u can create with minimal or very basic craft supplies. It's a perfect stressbuster for the current times.

items.title: Create Beautiful Christmas Baubles with Acrylic Pouring

visible_instructors.job_title: Artist for +20 years, Crafter, Teacher and avid Recycler :)
visible_instructors.name: Isha
visible_instructors.title: Isha Knill

items.headline: Learn how to create beautiful Christmas baubles using Acrylic Pouring/Fluid Art
objectives_summary: How to decorate beautiful Christmas Baubles using acrylic pouring

items.title: Geode Resin Art for Beginners
items.headline: Are you thinking about starting resin art for a hobby, to gift, or to sell and start your own business?
objectives_summary: The supplies needed to get started.
Mistakes to avoid that can cause your art to become ruined.
How to prep your gems and color combos.
